message: “Boersma has revealed the worst parts of human depravity and his guilty plea provides little comfort to those who would have suffered unspeakable horrors,” U.S. Attorney Jay Town said in a statement.

data.description: A Decatur man outfitted a trailer with restraints, a mattress and gynecological equipment to facilitate the planned kidnapping, rape and murder of a mother, and had plans to sell her
data.title: Decatur man pleads guilty to elaborate kidnapping, child sex-trafficking plot
